lead_paragraph: The day Euro 2016 kicked off, Paul Pogba's youthful face featured on the front page of L'Equipe, flanked by pictures of France's all-time greats Michel Platini and Zinedine Zidane.

headline.print_headline: Pogba Yet to Live Up to France's Expectations
headline.main: Pogba Yet to Live Up to France's Expectations
